= Grunt =
* Grunt Document: http://gruntjs.com/ <br>
 也可以再 Github 上的 grunt-docs 找到 https://github.com/gruntjs/grunt-docs

* 常用 plugins
 - 大部分 grunt contrib plugin 可以在 https://github.com/gruntjs search 到。
 - 如何生成自己的 plugin 可以参考, Grunt document 里的 Creating plugins 章节。http://gruntjs.com/creating-plugins
 - jshint https://github.com/gruntjs/grunt-contrib-jshint <br>
 Description: 用于 jshint 检查。<br>
 Install: `npm install grunt-contrib-jshint --save-dev` <br>
 Load: `grunt.loadNpmTasks('grunt-contrib-jshint');`
 - clean https://github.com/gruntjs/grunt-contrib-clean <br>
 Description: 用于清理文件或目录。<br>
 Install:  `npm install grunt-contrib-clean --save-dev` <br>
 Load:  `grunt.loadNpmTasks('grunt-contrib-clean');`
 - copy https://github.com/gruntjs/grunt-contrib-copy <br>
 Description: copy 文件，目录。可以用于打包之类的。<br>
 Install:  `npm install grunt-contrib-copy --save-dev` <br>
 Load:  `grunt.loadNpmTasks('grunt-contrib-copy');`
 - concat https://github.com/gruntjs/grunt-contrib-concat <br>
 Description: 合并 js or css files。<br>
 Install:  `npm install grunt-contrib-concat --save-dev` <br>
 Load:  `grunt.loadNpmTasks('grunt-contrib-concat');`
 - cssmin https://github.com/gruntjs/grunt-contrib-cssmin <br>
 Description: 压缩css。( 也可以考虑用 grunt-yui-compressor。提醒: 目前的 YUI 依赖 Java。）<br> 
 Install:  `npm install grunt-contrib-cssmin --save-dev` <br>
 Load:  `grunt.loadNpmTasks('grunt-contrib-cssmin');`
 - uglify https://github.com/gruntjs/grunt-contrib-uglify <br>
 Description: 压缩/丑化 js。( 也可以考虑用 grunt-yui-compressor。提醒: 目前的 YUI 依赖 Java。）<br> 
 Install:  `npm install grunt-contrib-uglify --save-dev` <br>
 Load:  `grunt.loadNpmTasks('grunt-contrib-uglify');`
